Title: Relates to establishing a racial equity, social justice, and implicit bias training program for all civil service appointees
Summary: Directs the department of civil service in consultation with the division of human rights to establish a racial equity, social justice, and implicit bias training program for all civil service appointees.
LawCode: Add ยง153, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to establishing a racial equity, social justice, and implicit bias training program for all civil service appointees
